Question
========

In an ANOVA with one factor A (3 levels), the following is found:

  -------- ---- ----- ---- --- Source df SS MS F A 2 48 Error 28 Total 30 300 -------- ---- ----- ---- ---

The mean of group one was 3 with 10 subjects and of group two the average was 5 also with 10 subjects. The conclusion of a 95% *follow up* confidence interval based on the above data according to Fisher's method with df = 25, can be denoted by

Answerlist
----------

* Μ1μ2.
* Μ1 > μ2.
* Μ1 = μ2.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Μ1μ2.: Incorrect
* Μ1 > μ2: Incorrect
* Μ1 = μ2: Correct
